name: BURN THE PLANTS
author: Redkangaroo
notes: Built to punish Sylvans and HEROs for throwing their whole deck in the grave while also protecting from the OTK meta. Struggles against piercing damage (i.e. Dakini, Drilldark), and passive play unless you can mill or summon Lava Golem soon. My favorite win was when a Magical Merchant milled 13 cards for 3900 damage from Skull Invitation.
